Class Matrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • Matrix
  • public class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a matrix of Rationals. It currently only works with 2X2 matricies. Has some helpful methods to create new matricies. Is immutable.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jacob Binder in conference with Nate Workman
